name: voice-commander-for-spotify
description: Control your Spotify using your voice and never again lose time looking up that song that you want to listen.
author: Lucas Rassilan Vilanova

scripts.start: echo "Execute 'npm run api' para iniciar a API do servidor e 'npm run front' para iniciar o frontend
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../voice-commander-for-spotify && npm install
